content: I feel you on this.When we love deeply, we will fight for what is right and true. Love is long lasting, so there must be trust developed to keep it going. Love for a country, is ensuring you resist all that can destroy it’s existence. Resistance comes with the realisation that what is there will contaminate the present and future. So yes, when you resist, it is a demonstration of love for all you hold dear in society. Sadly, Everyone has different values, morals and standards…thus love is different for many.
